TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAppDomainFactory

summary.span: 定义一个创建 Web 应用程序的新 实例的方法。

span.span: Defines a single method to create a new instance for a Web application.

summary.span: 此接口由 .NET Framework 2.0 以前的版本使用；2.0 版改用 接口。

span.span: This interface was used by .NET Framework versions earlier than 2.0; version 2.0 uses the interface instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (string module, string typeName, string appId, string appPath, string strUrlOfAppOrigin, int iZone);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create([in]string module, [in]string typeName, [in]string appId, [in]string appPath, [in]string strUrlOfAppOrigin, [in]int32 iZone) cil managed
Public Function Create (module As String, typeName As String, appId As String, appPath As String, strUrlOfAppOrigin As String, iZone As Integer) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Create(System::String ^ module, System::String ^ typeName, System::String ^ appId, System::String ^ appPath, System::String ^ strUrlOfAppOrigin, int iZone);

param.name: module
param.span: 包含 Web 应用程序的模块。

span.span: The module containing the Web application.
The type of the Web application.

param.name: appId
param.span: Web 应用程序的唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifier for the Web application.

param.name: appPath
param.span: Web 应用程序文件的路径。

span.span: The path to the Web application's files.

param.name: strUrlOfAppOrigin
param.span: Web 应用程序的原始 URL。

span.span: The URL of origin for the Web application.

param.name: iZone
param.span: Web 应用程序的起源的区域。

span.span: The zone of origin for the Web application.

summary.span: 为指定的 Web 应用程序创建一个新的应用程序域。

span.span: Creates a new application domain for the specified Web application.

summary.span: 此接口由 .NET Framework 2.0 以前的版本使用；2.0 版改用 接口。

span.span: This interface was used by .NET Framework versions earlier than 2.0; version 2.0 uses the interface instead.

returns.span: 指定的 Web 应用程序的新应用程序域。

span.span: A new application domain for the specified Web application.
